body:
>Thanks for doing this! I'm not sure if the immutable/json change will be helpful or not...

IMO, the value should be as 'generic' as possible, and the `List/Map` inclusions seemed a little too coupled to the implementation. I'll switch the Immutable `stringify` business now and tell bors to land!
body_text:
Thanks for doing this! I'm not sure if the immutable/json change will be helpful or not...

IMO, the value should be as 'generic' as possible, and the List/Map inclusions seemed a little too coupled to the implementation. I'll switch the Immutable stringify business now and tell bors to land!
body_html:
Thanks for doing this! I'm not sure if the immutable/json change will be helpful or not...

IMO, the value should be as 'generic' as possible, and the List/Map inclusions seemed a little too coupled to the implementation. I'll switch the Immutable stringify business now and tell bors to land!
